category: Presidential Election Management Regulations/Article 2 (Establishment of Election Steering Committee)
contents: Article 2 (Establishment of Election Steering Committee) ① The Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as the *Sports Council) appoints the President of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as the *Chairman) to perform duties following the election of the President of the Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as the *Chairman Election). The Election Steering Committee (hereinafter referred to as the *Committee) must be formed no later than 80 days before the expiration date of the term. However, in the case of re-elections and by-elections, they must be organized within 10 days from the date the reason for holding them is confirmed. ② The functions of the committee are as follows. Revised 2022. 12. 26. 1. Allocation of the number of voters 2. Preparation of the preliminary voter list 3. Preparation of the voter list 4. Viewing of the voter list and processing of objections 5. Decision on matters related to election management, such as election campaign methods 6. Hosting policy debates for candidates for the presidential election (hereinafter referred to as *candidates) 7. Sanctions for violations related to the presidential election 8. Deliberation and decision on objections to the election or election effect, etc. 9. Article 24-2, Article 4 of the Articles of Incorporation Prior review of whether the activity plan for international relations work under paragraph (3) is related to the election of the chairman. ③ The committee shall continue from the date of establishment until 60 days after the election date, but may be extended by resolution of the board of directors if necessary. ④ Notwithstanding paragraph 3, if the reason for holding a re-election or by-election is confirmed during the existence of the committee, the duration of the committee shall be extended to 60 days after the election date.
